itemBanana.name: Banana
itemBanana.description: A ripe banana. Better than nothing.

itemDagger.name: Dagger
itemDagger.description: A typical Tsenivian dagger, with a a somewhat dulled blade.

itemSword.name: Sword
itemSword.description: A standard Tsenivian sword, well-balanced and sharp.

itemSwordOfWrath.name: Sword of Wrath
itemSwordOfWrath.description: A large sword, with a red tinted blade. The ripple of light on the blade makes it look like a beating heart.

itemBow.name: Bow
itemBow.description: A simple wooden bow, mostly used to hunt game.

itemBowOfFury.name: Bow of Fury
itemBowOfFury.description: A great bow, black as night, heavy and powerful.

itemSpear.name: Spear
itemSpear.description: A long spear with a black wooden shaft.

itemSmallHealthPotion.name: Small Health Potion
itemSmallHealthPotion.description: A small vial filled with a red liquid that seems to swirl. Uncorking it releases a bitter smell. Restores 10HP.

itemTornLeatherArmor.name: Leather Armor
itemTornLeatherArmor.description: A leather chest armor in poor condition, offering minimal protection.

itemLeatherHelmet.name: Leather Helmet
itemLeatherHelmet.description: A leather helmet, offering basic protection for the head.

itemPickaxe.name: Pickaxe
itemPickaxe.description: A sturdy pickaxe, useful for mining.
